name: Origin (alex_krens)
description:
Origin - Game Jam - Beginners Circle Jam #3 - Theme: A different planet

A sort of action-platformer + turrets.. done in 2 weeks :O

Tutorial:

WASD - movement

1,2,3 skills:

1. Transform your arm into a canon (Uses 1 power)

2. Puts down a turret (Uses 2 power)

3. Consume the slimes and turn it into power

Credits:

Code & Art: Alex Sam L.

Music: Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com

  • Tape Star
  • Eyesplit
  • Al Andalus
  • Dead Spawn

Sound Effects: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Fonts: https://www.fontspace.com/

If you happen to like this game, consider following on @alex_krens
